reviews.review:
Mit abstand der coolste taktik shooter der momentan auf dem markt ist
es kommen immer noch neue updates mit neuen waffen raus            
einfach ein muss für jeden der shooter liebt.
Ne vous fiez pas aux premières parties en occasionnel, le vrai cs commence en compétitif.
Valve, dear, please, fix your f*cking bots

Great Game. Would recommend to anyone who likes FPS games. Also is great because I am new to pc, And I am still rubbish with keys and mouse. So Playing against Bots is Great way to get use to it, before multiplayer.                ( 5* out of 5*)
Um jogo bem divertido e estressante ao mesmo tempo '-
Good game but the russians ruin the whole experience.
O jogo levou os jogos counter strike para frente, até por isso ele é o melhor de todos os counters

Очень хороший шутер с большим онлайном.
Сюжет интересный, на несколько часов игры, затягивает, невозможно оторваться.

It's a good game. I like this game because it has an excelent graphic, it doesn't lags and the most hacks are patched so we won't see that much hackers anymore. I recommend this game for everyone that age is 13+

its fucking shit, but im an addict so

Советую игру, наиграл 7часов уже апнул звания в напарниках по мне игра крутая))
Muchas Horas Divertidas, y mejor si jugas con amigos
um jogo muito bom para jogar com os amigos
This game very bad, do not play.
It is trash but we all still love it.

I started playing this game more than 2.5 years ago.
I never stoppped playing this game.
The Game is usually taking place on a multiplayer map but you can find yourself on a coop mission offline map with a friend or in a surf community servers.

Let's not talk about the times the game goes up and getting to the news,
Even if that's because of the gambling or the game being on ESPORTS..
This game is a classic, First-Person Shooter (FPS), i got ton of skins,
a lot of experience in the game, gamesense, friends, fun.

I recommend this game not because the russians or cheaters, or hitboxes problems that there are and i don't deny it.
I recommend you to play the game to have fun, meeting new players, challenge yourself
"Return to the classics".

Gameplay: 9.5/10
trop de cheater les dev n'écoute pas les joueur en suppriment des maps pasr exemple mais trés amusant entre amis et gameplay intérresant

Es el mejor juego que he jugado nunca, aunque hayan los problemas con el VAC y que la gente que te encuentras puede ser tóxica. Pero aparte de esto, es un juego muy bueno, recomiendo jugarlo y si es con amigos muchísimo mejor
если скучно и думаешь что без смертный , то удачи
This game is very good, it is fun, though it can be a little frustrating when played alone, but still the to pass large funny moments with your friends.
